      Parameters:
      request - View Servelt request object
      model - model object, for show users it will be empty but the users list will be added.
      session - Http Session object

    • deleteUser

      @GetMapping("/deleteUser") public java.lang.String deleteUser​(@RequestParam(name="id",required=true) int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      id - from the USERID table field, used to select and delete a user
      model - , on deletion wont receive any extra attribute.

      forwarding View page

      Parameters:
